column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////WOW! I am not a breakfast person but this place was incredible. It was extremely busy and for great reason. We had the wildberry crepes and the corned beef benny and both were outstanding. Out waitress was also very friendly and took great care of us
column2: I think her name was Esmerelda? Anyways
column3: I cannot recommend this place enough. I wish I lived nearby so I could systematically try the entire menu. If you've read this far
column4: set your alarm early and go there tomorrow morning. If you just woke up
column5: get out of bed and get going! Don't even brush your teeth
